channel.title: Blast Pit Fan
channel.description: Whist going through the Chapter [b]Blast Pit[/b], the game crashed after I start the massive fan. I Have an mdmp attachment detailing the crash: Advice, solution, or ideas concerning the resolution to this issue would be appreciated. hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_14T20_32_10C0.mdmp (84.4 KB)

item.title: Blast Pit Fan
item.dc:creator: MaximusPM
item.description:
I confirm breaking the pallets solves this problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Blast Pit Fan
item.dc:creator: saxus
item.description:
You don’t see it. Simply reload the autosave and watch for crates.

Read full topic

item.title: Blast Pit Fan
item.dc:creator: Giggity
item.description:
I had this issue, then noticed that there was a crate on fan, destroyed the crate before turning it on and had no problems, also moved pallets out of the way

Had the same issue and didn’t have a crate on the fan, but throwing 2 pallets down helped, thank you, sir.

Read full topic

item.title: Blast Pit Fan

item.description:
I had this issue, then noticed that there was a crate on fan, destroyed the crate before turning it on and had no problems, also moved pallets out of the way.

Read full topic

item.title: Blast Pit Fan
item.dc:creator: Tirppa
item.description:
BM crashes at the big fan for me too, few seconds after starting it up.

Specs:
Intel Core i5-750
GeForce GTX 560 Ti (nVidia Driver version 306.23)
16 Gb RAM
Win 7 64-bit Pro
hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_14T22_1_38C0.mdmp (95.7 KB)

Read full topic

item.title: Blast Pit Fan
item.dc:creator: Link2006
item.description:
I confirm this bug, It seems to crash whenever the resolution is higher.

Running this in 1024x768 seems to work fine but setting it to 1920x1080 it causes my computer to crash

CPU: Intel Core i7 3770k
GFX: ATi Radeon HD 6850 (By Powercolor)
12GB Ram
Windows 7 Ultimate 64bit English.

EDIT: It seems to crash whenever it tries to emit the particles …

EDIT2: Attached some recent minidumps.
hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_14T21_38_45C0.mdmp (103 KB)
hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_14T21_36_21C0.mdmp (103 KB)

Read full topic

item.title: Blast Pit Fan
item.dc:creator: yuri
item.description:
Same here. Only restarting the map from a beginning save helped - it didn’t happen for 2nd time.

Multiple related mdmps: https://www.mediafire.com/?2e8f2pgop69a8hj

Read full topic
